CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests retainers view.
    - Number of retainers of an A object must be 2 (A itself and B).
    - When an object has just one retainer it must be expanded automatically until
      there's an object having two or more retainers.
    - Test the expansion of a long retainment chain is limited by a certain level.

Profiler was enabled.
Detailed heap profiles were enabled.

Running: testRetainersView

Running: testRetainersAutoExpandSingleRetainer

Running: testRetainersAutoExpandSingleRetainerLimit

Profiler was disabled.
